Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Oakland in 1993...
Injured on 6/2/1994 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...

Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1996, off Tommy Greene (BAL)...
